name: Infinite Beany
description:
Infinite Beany is a really "fun" and mostly annoying infinite runner made to annoy anyone who plays it. This game is made using really generic assets to annoy you even more. Even the dev just made this in like 10 mins. Ok fine i'll start exaggerating now; This is a very basic endless runner game where the platforms are generated randomly and the player has to move to prevent being pushed outside the screen. There is also a score system which updates the score when the player is in action. 

 

This is beany. He is stupid enough to infinitely run these random blocks. 

This is the main character that we, the user, will be controlling. The player sprite can only “Jump” to avoid the obstacles and to stay inside the screen. It has Idle, Run and Jump animations.

  

This is a platform. These are the moving blocks that the Player Sprite has to avoid. These blocks will be encountered by the player randomly.

That's it :) This game was made in the GDevelop Game Engine! Thanks for checking it out!
